top.title: Trump says US 'has to have' Greenland after naming special envoy
top.summary: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

top.title: US regulator approves pill form of Wegovy weight-loss drug
top.summary: Wegovy becomes first pill of its kind to be approved, shifting weight-loss drugs beyond injections.

top.title: Russia escalates attacks on key Ukrainian region of Odesa
top.summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky warned the attacks were an attempt by Moscow to block Ukraine's access to maritime logistics.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

top.title: Uber and Lyft announce plans to trial Chinese robotaxis in UK in 2026
top.summary: Baidu's Apollo Go robotaxis have already accrued millions of driverless rides in cities worldwide.

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?
